Package edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.method

Class Summary
CentromereFinding3DMethod A method analogous to the CentromereFindingMethod, but intended to be applied to 3D images.
CentromereFindingMethod Method to find centromeres in immunofluorescence images.
ChromosomeCentromereFindingMethod A method to find isolated chromosomes using DNA stain (designate using parameter marker_channel_index) as well as centromeres using a centromere marker (designate using parameter secondary_marker_channel_index).
DynamicMethod This class uses an XML file containing the specification of a method to run analysis.
Method An analysis method that can be run in an independent thread of execution.
NoisySpotFindingMethod Method to find spots in noisy images.
RandomKernelMethod  
RecursiveThresholdingMethod Implements the recursive Otsu thresholding method described in Xiong et al.
SeededWatershedMethod Implements the a version of the watershed method that is seeded off of supplied regions.
TestMethod A veritable playground of image analysis that will sit in the GUI and allow easy testing of new methods.
ThresholdingSizeMethod A method to find objects based on a gradient histogram thresholding step and a size-exclusion step.
TimeAveragingMethod A method that time averages images, and stores the time-averaged result in place of the usual mask output.
TimepointSplittingMethod  
WatershedMethod Implements the commonly used watershed method on the gradient of an Image.
